ssot__OrderDeliveryMethod__dlm.name: Order Delivery Method
ssot__OrderDeliveryMethod__dlm.description: The Order Delivery Method DMO represents the order and delivery methods for products or service fulfillment.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for a system’s logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for an object’s logical name where this record originated, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the sales order delivery method, for example, in-store pickup or overnight delivery.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Order Delivery Method DMO.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID for sale items, for example goods, services, bundles, and made-to-order products.
